en: Costa Rica Sur: Lambert Conic Conformal (1SP) (Costa_Rica_Sur)
Costa Rica recognises a 'common zone' between 9°32'N and 9°56'N where either Costa Rica Norte or Costa Rica Sur Lambert zones may be used.
